headline: SLB (SLB) Valuation Check After Tela AI Launch and Ongoing Digital Transformation Strategy
summary: SLB (SLB) is grabbing fresh attention after rolling out Tela, a new AI assistant woven into its digital platforms. This move underscores management’s push to reposition the company around higher margin technology. See our latest analysis for SLB. Despite the new AI push and the ChampionX deal closing, recent trading tells a more mixed story, with the share price roughly flat year to date but a five year total shareholder return still comfortably positive. This suggests long term momentum is...
